doc.previous: A prediction interval for a random variable is defined similarly to a confidence interval for a statistical parameter Consider an additional random variable Y which may or may not be statistically dependent on the random sample X Then u X v X provides a prediction interval for the as yet to be observed value y of Y if
doc.after: Here Pr indicates the joint probability distribution of the random variables X Y where this distribution depends on the statistical parameters
